akn:content.akn:p: (a) Establishment The Secretary, in consultation with the Secretary of Energy, shall establish a Rural Energy for America Program to promote energy efficiency and renewable energy development for agricultural producers and rural small businesses through—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Energy audits and renewable energy development assistance

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Energy audits and renewable energy development assistance

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Financial assistance for energy efficiency improvements and renewable energy systems

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Financial assistance for energy efficiency improvements and renewable energy systems
(d) Outreach The Secretary shall ensure, to the maximum extent practicable, that adequate outreach relating to this section is being conducted at the State and local levels.
